articles.title: ANALYSIS-'Drained of power': Argentina's Peronists face identity crisis after midterm rout
articles.description: The adjustment was tried repeatedly in Argentina and only deepened inequality and poverty," he said. POLITICAL COST The midterm loss is likely to come at a price for the government. "They will start to depend on negotiations with possible allies and, and when you enter into these types of talks, they start to come out expensive," said analyst Carlos Fara.
articles.content: Argentina's Peronist ruling coalition is teetering on the brink of political crisis, with President Alberto Fernandez facing a fight for control after voters abandoned his center-left party in bruising midterm elections, sapping his power in Congress... [3556 chars]

articles.title: Olympian Lalremsiami to lead India women's hockey team in Junior WC
articles.description: Hockey India on Monday named the 18-member junior women's team who will vie for honours at the FIH Hockey Women's Junior World Cup South Africa 2021. The event slated to begin on December 5 will witness 16 top teams from across the globe battle for the title which was previously won by Argentina in 2016.

articles.title: FIFA WC qualifiers: Argentina close in on World Cup spot; Messi plays 15 minutes in win over Uruguay
articles.description: FIFA WC qualifiers: Argentina closed in on a direct World Cup spot on Friday with a 1-0 win at Uruguay, despite the absence of Lionel Messi for most of the match as he recovers from a left knee injury.

articles.title: Argentina vs Brazil World Cup qualifier: A Messi-less side take on Neymar and Co for World Cup berth
articles.description: Argentina vs Brazil World Cup qualifier: Argentina can secure a World Cup spot if it beats Brazil and if two of three other teams — Uruguay, Chile and Colombia — fail to win but will have to do so without injured Lionel Messi.

articles.title: Argentina president suffers big loss in midterm elections
articles.description: President Alberto Fernandez suffered a severe setback in Argentina's midterm elections held Sunday amid widespread anger over high inflation and rising poverty, with his governing coalition losing control of the Senate and threatened with falling from its position as the biggest bloc in the Chamber of Deputies.
articles.content:
Debora Rey And Almudena Calatrava, The Associated Press
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) - President Alberto Fernandez suffered a severe setback in Argentina's midterm elections held Sunday amid widespread anger over high inflation and rising poverty, wi... [3293 chars]
